macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Consolidates Around $68,376 Amid Easing Selling Pressure
items.summary: Bitcoin price is consolidating between $65,729 and $71,746, trading at $68,376 on Monday with RSI rebounding from oversold levels and MACD showing a bullish crossover, signaling potential recovery toward $73,072.[1]

items.title: Coinbase Stock Surges 16% as Retail Investors Accumulate Bitcoin and Ethereum
items.summary: Coinbase stock rallied 16% as retail users continue stacking Bitcoin and Ethereum amid market activity.[2]

items.title: Pi Network Price Extends Recovery Above $0.1700 Despite Profit-Taking
items.summary: Pi Network (PI) trades above $0.1700, testing the 50-day EMA at $0.1767, with 2.90 million tokens deposited to exchanges indicating profit-taking after recent gains, though rally risks reversal post node upgrade.[1]

items.title: Dogecoin Faces Bearish Pressure After 7% Drop, Eyes $0.0950 Low
items.summary: Dogecoin holds above $0.1000 following a 7% Sunday drop, but 50-day EMA caps gains with bearish bias targeting October low at $0.0950 or deeper at $0.0800.[1]

items.title: Bitcoin Price Drops from $124,000 to Around $70,000, Crypto Market Cap Falls $2 Trillion
items.summary: Bitcoin has fallen from $124,000 in early October to about $70,000, with total cryptocurrency market value declining by over $2 trillion.[4]

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Kerala Launches Nationwide-First AI Awareness Drive for 600,000 Parents
items.summary: Kerala's KITE initiative, Sarvam AI Mayam, trains 6 lakh parents on AI tools for identifying birds, plants, photo restoration, and detecting deepfakes via school networks until June 2026.

items.title: India Hosts AI Impact Summit 2026 in New Delhi with PM Modi
items.summary: The summit from February 16-20 brings global leaders to discuss AI policy, innovation, workforce readiness, and features exhibitions of real-world AI applications; PM Modi emphasized India's leading role.

items.title: New Risks Emerge as AI Agents Enter Physical World Applications
items.summary: Agentic AI systems are advancing into robotics and real-world tasks, shifting focus from cognition to sensorimotor control, enabled by ubiquitous sensors and edge compute, redefining industries like finance.

items.title: Global AI Industry Recap Highlights Breakthrough Models and Geopolitical Tensions
items.summary: February 14 recap covers key AI model breakthroughs, industry transformations, and rising geopolitical issues in the AI sector.

items.title: Delhi Positions as Potential AI City Amid India AI Impact Summit
items.summary: India AI Impact Summit 2026 under IndiaAI Mission spotlights Delhi's ambitions to become a major AI hub within Digital India.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: ByteDance in Talks to Sell Mobile Legends: Bang Bang Developer Moonton for $6 Billion
items.summary: ByteDance is reportedly negotiating the sale of Moonton, the developer of the popular MOBA Mobile Legends: Bang Bang, in a potential $6 billion deal. This move comes amid strategic shifts in the gaming industry.

items.title: Konami Announces Major Castlevania Revival with New Sequel
items.summary: Konami has confirmed plans to revive the Castlevania franchise, starting with the announcement of a major new sequel. This marks a significant return for the long-running series.

items.title: Sega Reveals Roadmap for Four Major New Titles on Mainstay IPs by 2027
items.summary: Following poor Q3 FY26 financial results, Sega shared its future plans, confirming the release of four major new titles based on its core intellectual properties by 2027.

items.title: High on Life 2 Receives Positive Review and Gaming League Attention
items.summary: Squanch Games' High on Life 2, sequel to the 2022 hit, earned a review on PC and saw its score rise significantly in a gaming prediction league, winning bids up to $32.
items.source: Checkpoint Gaming / The Ancient Gaming Noob

items.title: PC Gamer Highlights Five Overlooked New Steam Releases
items.summary: New indie titles like Roadside Research (co-op alien gas station sim), Polyarmory: High Calibre Love, The Prisoning: Fletcher's Quest, and Shadows of the Afterland launched recently on Steam.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
